sentences.en: "Where did you put it?" he rasped.
sentences.cn: “你把它放在哪儿了？”他尖声地问。

sentences.en: He wanted to rasp the surface smooth.
He was still laughing when he heard the rasp of Rennie's voice.
sentences.cn: 当他听到伦尼尖叫的声音时仍然在笑.

sentences.en: He's got a surface flow of suavity, but he's rough as a rasp underneath.
sentences.cn: 他表面看来和和气气的, 其实是个粗野狂暴的恶棍.

sentences.en: It acts as a geologic rasp , scratching , gouging and generallythe surfaces the glacier rides.
sentences.cn: 它就像一把地质锉刀一样通过刮、刨等作用来磨损冰川流过的表面.

sentences.en: It acts as a geologic rasp , scratching, gouging and generally abroding the surfaces the glacier rides.
sentences.cn: 它就象一把地质锉刀一样通过刮 、 刨等作用来磨损冰川流过的表面.

sentences.en: Snow muffles the shriek of metal and the rasp of motion.
sentences.cn: 大雪掩盖了金属的尖叫声和机器的刺耳声.

sentences.en: The act of filing with a rasp.
There was an ugly rasp in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他说话时声音十分刺耳难听.

sentences.en: There was the rasp of a bolt and the door opened.
sentences.cn: 门闩发出刺耳声响,门开了.

sentences.en: We are going to rasp off the rough edges.
sentences.cn: 我们要把粗糙的边锉掉.

words.tran_cn: 用锉刀锉；发出刺耳声（rasp的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 粗锉，木锉，[机]锉机，锉磨而发出的刺耳声音，（心里的）焦急，烦躁
发出刺耳的声音； 锉， 刮削
trans.tran_en: to make a rough unpleasant sound

trans.tran_cn: 以粗锉打磨，粗刮，发出摩擦的刺耳声，伤（人感情），使焦急，用急躁刺耳的声音说
